function.name: aniseed_agent
function.description: Handles queries related to the ANISEED (Ascidian Network for In Situ Expression and Embryological Data) database.

query.description: Natural language query about ascidian gene expression, developmental stages, anatomical structures, or any combination thereof.

function.name: baio_agent
function.description: The main agent that coordinates between different tools and databases, including NCBI services like BLAST and E-utilities and api calls to the UCSC genome browser.

query.description: Natural language query describing desired search and the DNA or protein sequences.

function.name: csv_chatter_agent
function.description: Allows you to interact with and analyze CSV files using natural language queries.

query.description: Natural Language query about the csv file

file_name.description: Name of the csv file you want to analyze

function.name: nl_to_go_agent
function.description: sed when the input is a natural language written query containing gene names that need a GO annotation. Tool to find gene ontologies (using mygene), outputs data frame with GO & gene id annotated gene names

query.description: A natural language string containing gene names to be processed.
